comments:
org.eclipse.birt.core unit test failed in daily build 20060421.

Please see the attachment for details.

Two errors (drop 2) in it were caused by the wrong file full path created by data team. Please have a look:

The core test is now using plugin test rather than unit test, this leads to the problem. However the test cases of problem is no longer necessary. Remove as appropriated.

Verified in daily build 20060426.

Bug closed.
